title: AudiHealth
description: AudiHealth is a machine learning-based application designed to detect voice pathologies, specifically vocal polyp and laryngitis, using audio data. Leveraging the power of VGGish for feature extraction and a Liquid State Machine (LSM) model for classification, AudiHealth aims to provide early detection capabilities, potentially improving patient outcomes.

title: MockQuero
description: MockQuero is an intelligent job interview preparation platform designed to help candidates practice and enhance their interview skills through realistic mock interviews, personalized feedback, and performance insights.

title: MindMedix
description: An Intelligent Eye That Perceives Brain Disease with accuracy for Understaffed Hospitals, Fast Process.

title: Decentralized Peyroll System
description: A Modern and Decentralized Blockchain Powerd Peyroll Automater for on Chain payments.

title: Annocrop
description: An AI-driven crop price prediction and analysis system that helps farmers accurately predict market prices for their crops while providing essential insights through image-based crop analysis.

title: Nazeon
description: Cyberpunk Themed Terminal Emulator. Built on top for Hyper.js Terminals

title: NFT Gaming Educhain
description: This project allows users to watch Twitch streams, place bets on live eSports games, and earn tokens. Upon accumulating 10N tokens, users can mint a free ticket to the next live eSports game. These tickets can be sold or purchased from other users, creating an engaging, blockchain-integrated gaming experience.

title: GitHub Bot
description: This script automates the process of generating random numbers of Git commits on random days within a specified date range. It is built using Node.js and leverages several npm packages for functionality.

title: Anonymous Feedback dApp
description: Anonymouse Feedback dApp is a decentralized application on the Steller blockchain that allows users to submit anonymous feedback. Each feedback is assigned a unique ID by the smart contract, ensuring privacy and secure access. It integrates with Freighter wallet and features a simple, user-friendly interface.

title: Profile Avatar Generator
description: Avatar is a web-based SVG avatar generator designed for creating variations of a specific profile picture. It allows users to easily adjust the color palette of their avatar, making it an ideal tool for personalizing and generating different versions of one's own profile picture. While it offers flexibility in color customization, it does not support altering the avatar's fundamental design or structure.
